src:
Setelah Lakoni Empat Laga Tandang, MU Rindu Bermain di Old Trafford
06 Nov 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Gelandang Manchester United, Fred mengaku sangat antusias dengan pertandingan Liga Europa melawan Partizan Belgrade dini hari nanti. Fred menyebut laga ini spesial karena Setan Merah akan kembali bermain di Old Trafford.
Manchester United akan beraksi di ajang Liga Europa pada hari Jumat (8/11) dini hari nanti. Mereka akan menjamu Partizan Belgrade di Old Trafford.
United sendiri sudah cukup lama tidak bermain di Old Trafford. Mereka memainkan empat laga terakhir mereka dengan bertandang, sehingga ini pertama kalinya United bermain kembali di markas mereka.
Fred mengaku tidak sabar untuk bermain di Old Trafford lagi. "Ah, rasanya benar-benar luar biasa [bermain di Old Trafford]," ujar Fred kepada situs resmi Manchester United.

Baca komentar lengkap sang gelandang di bawah ini.
text:
After Lakoni Four away games, MU longs to play at Old Trafford
Nov 6 2019, 17:00 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester United midfielder Fred claims to be very enthusiastic about the Europa League match against Partizan Belgrade in the early morning. Fred called this fight special because the Red Devils will return to play at Old Trafford.
Manchester United will be in action at the Europa League on Friday (8/11) early morning. They will host Partizan Belgrade at Old Trafford.
United themselves have not played at Old Trafford for a long time. They played their last four matches away, so this is the first time United have played back at their base.
Fred claimed he couldn't wait to play at Old Trafford again. "Ah, it feels really extraordinary [to play at Old Trafford]," Fred told the official Manchester United website.

Read the midfielder's full comments below.
